reviews.comments: Excelente ubicación. El departamento tiene todo lo necesario para una hermosa estadía. Fácil acceso a varias  lineas de subte. Ricardo, excelente anfitrión, amable y comunicativo. Super recomendable.
Excelente departamento!! Todo nuevo y super limpio. La cama y el colchón espectaculares!Ricardo es un muy buen anfitrión...el departamento es super recomendable!!!

Alquilé el departamento para mi padre y su esposa. Volvieron encantados con Ricardo y el lugar. Destacaron la ubicación y belleza del lugar, así como sus comodidades, confort y limpieza. Les fascinó la vista desde el balcón. Asimismo elogiaron la disposición y trato cordial del anfitrión. Sin duda volvería a alquilarlo.
Ricardo es muy agradable, nos recibió con una sonrisa y nos ayudó a descargar el equipaje del taxi. El departamento es cálido y cómodo, posee una ubicación perfecta.

Excelente departamento con todas sus comodidades. La ubicacion es inmejorable.
Lo mejor de todo es la vista del balcon.
La atencion de ricardo barba y se amoldo a nuestro horario de check in y check out.
Altamente recomendable y seguramente volveremos a visitarlo.

El alojamiento de Ricardo presenta inmejorables condiciones para quienes buscan descubrir la ciudad. Lo recomiendo en especial para parejas que quieran descubrir los placeres de BAIRES por primera vez. Excelente vista al obelisco y cercano a todos los lugares de interés turístico. Excelente comunicación de Ricardo quien incluso te guía en lo que requieras, tanto que el alojamiento mantiene una tarjeta para el transporte publico a disposición. Conectado con todos los medios de transporte y además con un estilo increíble y todas las comodidades necesarias para una buena estancia.
El departamento se ve mejor que en las fotos, ubicación inmejorable, Ricardo muy atento a que no nos faltara nada, sin duda alguna lo recomiendo.
El departamento esta en la mejor ubicación, todo cerca y co mucha seguridad! Ampliamente recomendable!

El apartamento es tal cuál como aparece en las fotos, es bonito y acogedor; tiene una ubicación excepcional y Ricardo es un excelente anfitrión, todo el tiempo estuvo pendiente de nosotros y que la pasáramos bien. Muy recomendado!
Muy buena ubicación, muy buen lugar para pasar en buenos aires
Excelente apartamento, muy bien situado y comunicado. Excelente vista del Obelisco y la Avenida Corrientes. Ricardo siempre estuvo al pendiente. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
Excelente ubicacion! Great location! Ricardo tiene todo lo que necesitas, un hogar muy comodo! Ricardo has everything you need! Very comfortable home.

La mejor ubicación de Buenos Aires a un excelente precio. Departamento muy cómodo y Ricardo estuvo siempre atento a cualquier requerimiento.
100% recomendable.
Excelente opción. Excelente ubicación. Excelente host

La estadía en el departamento fue excelente. El lugar limpio, mejor que en las fotos, super buena ubicación y la comunicación con Ricardo fluida. Además fue muy amable y flexible con la hora de retiro. Recomiendo totalmente la estadía en su departamento.

El departamento estaba impecable y con todas las comodidades que necesitábamos. 
Más central no se podía pedir, metro, colectivos y taxis a la vuelta de la esquina. Súper cerca de teatros y paseos/tiendas. 
Ricardo es un excelente anfitrión muy preocupado de nuestra llegada, estadía y regreso. Definitivamente para recomendar a familiares y amigos!

Ricardo es excelente anfitrión, preocupado y muy atento a nuestros requerimientos. El departamento es perfecto, tal cual o mejor que las imágenes que se muestran. Todo limpio y con detalles que hacen que la estadía sea la mejor. Recomiendo 100% a Ricardo y su departamento.

Un verdadero placer haber pasado las vacaciones en el departamento de Ricardo.  Desde los consejos antes de la llegada, los detalles en el departamento (tenia fruta, un vino, una tarjeta con carga para los medios de transporte y otros detalles) nos hicieron sentir bien recibidos.  Ni que decir de la ubicación del dpto que es excelente y ese balcon son las mesitas para descansar mientras se contempla todo el movimiento en la ciudad es maravilloso.  Todo lo descrito se cumplio e incluso se supero. Gracias Ricardo y esperamos volver muy pronto.

Todo perfecto en nuestra segunda estadía en el depto. de Ricardo. 
Nuevamente Ricardo atendió muy amablemente todas nuestras necesidades. 
Gracias!
Excelente todo Ricardo un muy buen anfitrion apoyo a mis padres y a mi tia en su visita hizo de este viaje algo inolvidable  para ellos
Ricardo se encargó de darnos suficiente información para que nuestra estadía sea estupenda.  Excelente anfitrion

Mi esposa y yo tuvimos una estadìa muy comoda en el depto de Ricardo. Muchas gracias por los detalles! Ricardo siempre estuvo en contacto para oir nuestras necesidades.
La ubicaciòn es inmejorable , y el portero Don Angel es un verdadero angel!
Volveremos pronto.

La ubicacion de este departamento es excelente, a solo pasos de todo.
El barrio esta en el punto mas concurrido de Buenos aires que esta frente al Obelizco o Plaza de la Republica.  
Como en toda gran ciudad, hay delincuencia en los barrios turisticos, por lo cual hay que tener precauciones principalmente despues de la media noche no caminar por calles solitarias.  El departamento esta en una esquina en donde hay un restaurante abierto casi las 24 horas en la planta baja. Utro mas de pizas a la leña excelentes ubicado a un lado y otro mas de comida Italiana a un lado del de las pizzas.   El edificio en donde se encuentra el departamento cuenta con portero las 24 horas.

Mi estadía en Buenos Aires fue excelente  Ricardo es un gran anfitrión Estuvo atento de todo lo que necesitara
Nos cambiaba las toallas todas las semanas y nos contactaba constantemente para ver que necesitábamos
El apartamento está en un sitio muy estratégico frente al obelisco donde tienes todos los servicios
Muchísimas gracias Ricardo por tu atención

El apartamento es estupendo, tal cual muestran las fotos. Decorado con muy buen gusto y funcionalidad. La zona es inmejorable, cerca de todo. 
Capítulo aparte para Ricardo: un anfitrión de lujo. Atento a los mínimos detalles para que nos sintiéramos cómodos, estuvo permanentemente a la orden y en contacto para resolver cualquier situación. Nos proporcionó un documento que él mismo preparó con recomendaciones y tips para mejorar la estadía. Se nota el cariño y esmero que le pone para que siempre uno quiera volver.

El apartamento es tal y como se ve en las fotos. La ubicación es sin duda una de las mejores de Buenos Aires. Ricardo nos espero un rato ya que nuestro transporte se retrasó y nos tenía un vino que disfrutamos montones. Desde antes de reservar la respuesta de Ricardo fue rápida y atenta y ni hablar de su disposición de ayudarnos mientras estuvimos en Buenos Aires. El edificio es muy seguro desde el elevador hasta el balcón es un hit. Recomendamos ampliamente a este anfitrión. En nuestra próxima visita lo llamaremos de nuevo. Mil gracias a Él!

Ricardo fue un excelente anfitrión. Nuestra estadia en el departamento fue genial. Dos adultos y dos adolescentes. El departamento tenia todo lo necesario. Limpieza era impecable .Ricardo nos recibio con un Malbec como atencion, agua jugo y coca en la heladera. Tambien preparo toda la  casa para 4 (URL HIDDEN) vista del balcón es inmejorable . Hermoso lugar para tener una linda cena o una copa de vino al final del dia. La mejor postal de Buenos Aires. La ubicacion del departamento pleno centro porteño sobre la calle de todas las obras de teatro o espectaculos musicales. A pocas cuadras del teatro Colon. La oferta gastronomica es variada alrededor y casi todo esta abierto las 24 hrs. En frente del departamento hay una empresa de turismo donde comprar tickets del tourbus y otras salidas. Tambien en frente del departamento un banco con ATM . Seguridad en el departamento 24 hrs . Wifi funcionaba perfecto. Lo recomiendo plenamente y yo misma volveria a quedarme en el lugar. Gracias Ricardo

Si hay algo fundamental del departamento de Ricardo, es la ubicación. Simplemente perfecta, a metros de 3 líneas de subte (subway) y avenidas principales para moverse hacia cualquier parte. Además, se puede simplemente caminar hacia puerto madero, recorrer avenida Corrientes, ir a Recoleta, San Telmo, entre otras. El alojamiento es muy bueno, funcional, impecable, cómodo. Buenos servicios, porteros las 24 horas ( muy amables todos ellos)  y Ricardo fue un anfitrión bien dispuesto y atento.  Totalmente recomendable.

El apartamento es muy comodo y acogedor, fui con mi papa y nos sentimos como en casa. La ubicacion maravillosa, porteros muy amables y atentos y Ricardo siempre muy pendiente a cualquier necesidad. La vista es espectacular!!! Sin duda recomendable al 200%

This apartment is very well suited to discovering Buenos Aires wonderfull neighbourhoods.  We felt very safe with the24/7 security especially with the often mentioned Angel who sent us off every day with "You be carefull, you be relaxed" Ricardo our host was akways available and responsive to our questions. Ricardo is an interesting and very knowledgeable person.
Verry Good clean Place.  We really reccomend Ricardo's appartement Location and host are the best.

Everything here is fantastic if you need a location in Centro. Meter from the Obelisk and several Subte lines and great restaurants you will be all set. Ricardo was great with communication - he messaged me prior to my arrival and ensured I checked-in safely. He also provided a local guide, charged Subte, and bottle of wine for my arrival - not to mention updates when their were unexpected protests/weather. Furthermore, he communicated with the desk guards so they knew I was arriving - and they were very helpful also, 24/7. The apartment itself is great - spacious, clean, lots of light with great balcony. The wifi is fast - I was able to work remotely and use video calls with no problem. With the door security, I felt very safe despite the location being very busy and sometimes chaotic. If you're looking for a spacious, centralized location - this is the best.

Ricardo is a fantastic host. Extremely attentive and helpful. He gave us tips and tricks for around the city. He also made dinner reservations as well as airport transportation arrangements for us. The apartment is just as advertised. The highlight is definitely the view of the obelisco area. There are also plugs with USB outlets and we were set up with a bottle of wine upon our arrival. I would absolutely recommend this spot for adventurous travelers!!

Ricardo and his apartment were both great. His apartment's location was fantastic. It was close to many different subway stations. It also looked convenient to the bus, but we didn't personally take the bus. Ricardo left us a SUBE card already charged, which made it easy to use the public transportation. It was a doorman building with a code for the room (not a key), which made it easy to go securely in and out without worrying about losing anything. 

Ricardo was extremely responsive. Anytime we had a question, he responded quickly, whether it was where we could find an ATM, or diapers, or a playground. He even went above and beyond to take pictures of the closest playground for us, so we could get a sense of it. He also left diapers and wipes for us, in addition to a fully set up Pack and Play in the apartment for our arrival.

The washing machine was functional, and he left us a drying rack which worked great. (But if you put it out on the balcony, make sure to weigh down your clothes - it's windy!) The kitchen is small, but relatively well stocked. It had everything we needed to store our food (decent size fridge and small freezer) and warm up leftovers (toaster oven and hot plate). We didn't do any major cooking, so I can't comment on that. The bathroom was relatively standard, but well stocked with shampoo, conditioner, and soap. Bedroom was not huge, but big enough and had plenty of storage space if you want to fully unpack. (Big closet with drawers.) The living room we mostly used as a space for our daughter, but it had a comfortable couch, nice table, and TV (which we didn't use, so I can't comment on, but it looked easy.)

Overall, we had a great time, and Ricardo was a fantastic host!

Simplesmente maravilhoso.  O apartamento, a localização, a  atenção de Ricardo foram extremamente satisfatórias. As fotos comprovam isso, mas a atenção e disponibilidade do anfitrião  são espetaculares. Recomendo a todos conhecerem e se hospedar neste apartamento. Vou a BsAs duas vezes por ano, a espero sempre me hospedar com Ricardo. Só tenho a agradecer e parabenizar por tudo.
Great place, great location and Ricardo is very helpfull with anything!

We stayed at Ricardo's place for five days in total and really enjoyed. The apartment looked just like the pictures and was very clean. The communication with the host was easy and quick. Ricardo was very helpful with any requests we had.

Ricardo's place is great. It has an awesome view. The location gives you easy access to the heart of the city yet is a nice and quiet oasis when you need a break. The 24/7 doorman adds a nice layer of extra security. Ricardo is also very helpful and even took me to meet a money changer he trusted when I needed to exchange US dollars for Argentine pesos. I would definitely consider staying there again in the future.

Ricardo's place was just as advertised. Central location was fabulous, allowing us to walk all around the city. Kitchen is small but has everything you need to fix meals: refrigerator, hot plates, microwave, large toaster oven. Balcony area has a great view of the Obelisk and Plaza de la Republica and roomy enough for two to sip wine and eat dinner. Ricardo was also extremely helpful in getting us checked in and then back to the airport at the end of our trip.

Eduardo has been nice and very flexible on the schedules of arrival and departure. The appartement is perfectly located and I recommend it. Only if you are looking for calm and silence don't choose this flat (noise of all avenues around).
reviews.response:
Marie-Elise was not even part of the group, neither knows my name.. The apartment has new double laminated glass windows plus double heavy curtain. It also has an external shutter that her friends told me two days before leaving could not operate it. I offer to show how it works but they told me not to go.
Anyway, I let them perform a very late check out for free, and when I went to the apartment they were already gone. My surprise was to find not only the shutter was perfectly functioning but also the window was not properly close.

reviews.comments: Um bom lugar para ficar. Ricardo é muito atencioso, sempre disponível para nos ajudar. Gracias!
Great place. Clean with amazing location!

O local é estratégico, perto de tudo, acesso aos meios de transporte são perfeitos! Ricardo deu todo o apoio necessário! Apartamento é suficiente e completo para passar vários dias sem nada a reclamar.

Ricardo's apartment is absolutely wonderful and he is a fantastic host! If you are going to be in BA and want to stay at a nice place in the center of the city then this is the place for you. The apartment is on the 8th floor and has a beautiful view of Avenida Corrientes and the Obelisco.

The apartment itself is very clean and well equipped with everything one would need. But it is the extra amenities that make it such a pleasant stay. When not out exploring the city there is Netflix in both the living room and bedroom with plenty of entertainment. There is also a grill on the balcony if you are staying long enough to cook at home. I found the bed and pillows quite comfortable and  really appreciated the blackout curtains so as not to let any light in the room in the morning. 

Finally, of all the hosts I've had Ricardo is certainly the most attentative and helpful.  He stayed in contact throughout my stay to make sure I had everything I needed as well as offer suggestions for things to do in town. 
Overall, a very lovely stay in a great apartment with a super host! 
Do not hesitate to stay here, you will not be disappointed.
The best apartment in the central of Buenos Aires

Ricardo foi um excelente Anfitrião. Muito atencioso. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, limpo e confortável.
A varanda é sensacional!
Clean and cozy apartment in the heart of Buenos Aires. Ricardo is a very responsible host. Thank you for all!

Ricardo was the best host we have experienced using AirBnB, a true “SuperHost”!! Well before we arrived, Ricardo checked in with us to see if there was anything we needed and offered some tips for arrival and things to do. He was exceptionally easy to connect with if we had issues or questions, whether it was about how something worked in the apartment or how to navigate parts of Buenos Aires or our overall travel.  He went “above and beyond”, even personally helping us to secure a reservation at a great restaurant for our final night!

In addition to being a great host, his property was an outstanding home base for our stay.  Yes, it’s city living, and people not used to the hustle, bustle, and grit of a city may be a bit uncomfortable, but we loved it, and the city sounds and lights never impacted our sleep: he has fantastic blackout shades that also block out the noise since we were on the 8th floor. Here are a few aspects of the apartment that made it a great place to stay.
1. His wireless Internet worked exceptionally well, so we could do restaurant and tourism research easily.
2. His balcony was a perfect place for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. We enjoyed countless meals looking out over the Obelisco and the city!
3. Ricardo’s folder of travel tips and apartment instructions was detailed and thorough, answering most questions we had before having to ask them, and his suggestions for local restaurants, bars, and activities were exceptional.
4. Getting in and out of the apartment was easy, thanks to a 24-hour doorman service and a keyless, code-based entry to the apartment, so there was no need to navigate keys.
5. His location is central, with easy access to public transportation and taxicabs just outside his place, and we could walk to most of the best destinations.

We can’t say enough about Ricardo or his place, and if you want a city apartment in the middle of it all, with a great host to help your travels be the best they can be, book this apartment with Ricardo!

Sem dúvidas a acomodação do Ricardo é a melhor da região. O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos. Apesar de estar no Centro, mesmo com toda movimentação é um local tranquilo e com um excelente isolamento acústico. Bem equipado. O prédio é tranquilo e os porteiros são extremamente solícitos e atenciosos. A portaria é 24h, e bem segura. A vista é de encantar quem visita a cidade. A localização sem duvidas é um dos pontos mais fortes, pois é de fácil acesso a vários pontos turísticos. A recepção feita pelo Ricardo é extremamente adorável, nos deixou vinho, água,suco, cartão do Subte para nosso uso e vários outros detalhes que nos surpreenderam. Obrigada mais uma vez Ricardo, pela excelente recepção!

O espaço de Ricardo é simplesmente incrível acabei de chegar de lá onde fiquei eu e um amigo por 12 dias , desde o primeiro dia fomos recepcionados com uma boa garrafa de vinho , uma cesta de frutas, geladeira abastecida um regalo que não esperava encontrar , de cara já ficamos muito satisfeitos ... o local super limpo , impecável  tudo conforme as fotos .. local super bem localizado em uma das principais avenidas Corrientes com a famosíssima 9 Julio . Ao lado de uma das mais antigas e tradicionais pizzaria ,  frente ao McDonald's e Subway , cercado de farmácia , supermercado , lojas , restaurantes e teatros  ... porteiro 24 horas ... quartos com boa vedação sonora e de luminosidade o que deixa você dormi até 12:00 sem nenhum problema ... O Ricardo é um excelente anfitrião que sabe te dar a liberdade que você precisa é o apoio necessário me
Colocou todos os seus contatos à disposição para caso precisasse de algo e sempre pronto a nos atender .. a cama a roupa de Cama , de
Banho tudo limpo e excelente ... no espaço tem netflix , TV , Wi Fi , SmartTv e tudo funciona perfeitamente .. resumindo não penso duas vezes pra
Recomendar o espaço e vou sim me hospedar mais vezes pois realmente vale a pena .... a

Ricardo is an extraordinary host! He welcomed us personally and he did everything to let us enjoy our stay. He has great recommendations for events and was always available. Very high attention to detail, wow!

The accommodation cannot be topped due to its location: the breakfasts on the balcony over the busy streets and the incredible sunsets from here will definitely be remembered. The rainy nights with smooth working Netflix are also to be mentioned. :) everything looks and is as amazing as on the photos.

If you are in Buenos Aires you cannot do better than to stay here. Thank you very much, Ricardo!
Beautiful little apartment in top location. Ricardo is a great host and helped us with all our needs so that our stay was unforgettable.

Ricardo's apartment is within easy reach of all amenities - restaurants, nightlife, tourist areas.  It is a clean, and secure building.  Ricardo is a great host with ideas on where to eat, where to go for entertainment and will to provide support to make your stay pleasant, no matter whether for business or leisure.  The apartment is equipped with all expected amenities whether it's to watch movies, cook meals, or conduct business on the internet,  and the beds are super comfy.

Eu e minha filha estivemos em Buenos Aires por 6 dias. A localização do apto é excelente, está a poucas quadras do Teatro Colon, rua Florida, Casa Rosada, teatros etc, excelente lugar para quem quer ter acesso aos principais pontos turísticos a pé ou através de subte. O apto é bastante seguro, se acessa por senha, e a portaria é 24 horas. O prédio é antigo, o apto é aconchegante. Quanto ao Ricardo, só tenho a agradecer, sempre bastante cordial e acessível.

The place was better than we expected even though the listing looked pretty good already. Ricardo left the apartment in perfect condition for us, even with a bottle of Argentinean Malbec to receive us !!! (not to mention metro cards to facilitate our using Buenos Aires metro).  The views and the balcony are to die for: you are right up next to the Obelisk and along Corrientes street (the one with all Buenos Aires theaters). The bedroom is super comfortable and the apartment big enough for 2-3 people. And, if you want to be in the middle of Buenos Aires, it's hard to improve on this location.

Ricardo was always on top of things and made sure nothing was missing. We highly recommend Ricardo and his apartment for a memorable stay in Buenos Aires!
Sr Ricardo foi Solicito, prestativo, sempre a postos quando solicitado. Apto prático, limpo, agradável, selencioso, confortável. Ótima localização. Nota 10

Ricardo is an extremely accommodating and accessible host. He is easy to communicate with and goes out of his way to provide helpful information. It is important to Ricardo that his guests have a positive experience while visiting Buenos Aires. The apartment is very  secure and Is within walking distance to restaurants, places of interest and transportation.

Ricardos apartment is a really great place to stay when exploring BA. It is in a very convinent area for sightseeing, but also very quiet placed on the 8th fl. The balcony is a lovely place to relax and enjoy life below. Everything in the apartment worked well, was very clean and comfortable. The apartment is a really nice and safe place for a stay in BA and Ricardo is a really great and very nice host.

We had seven nights at Ricardo's apartment. Location was great and the apartment was very nice. Just as advertised. We felt safe and enjoyed visiting with Angel, one of the security guards. Ricardo was very gracious and accommodating. We highly recommend Ricardo's apartment and we hope to come back to Buenos Aries one day.

Ricardo's place is centrally located with the subway for 3 lines at the doorstep. Ricardo was very helpful and even assisted us in translating when we got our local sim cards. He was always responsive to questions. The apartment was well-equipped amenities-wise and the Internet connection was pretty decent. It was really easy to settle in.

O Ricardo é um excelente anfitrião. Atencioso e educado. O apartamento é incrível, exatamente como está nas fotos. Perto de tudo, aconchegante e de muito bom gosto. Uma experiência única para quem quer curtir Buenos Aires.

Ricardo was an excellent host. His apartment was very cozy and had an amazing view from the balcony. Bed is super comfy and there was no noise whatsoever! Safe building and great location with easy access to all the sites. Subway is right across the street from the building. Great experience overall!

Where is the six star ****** button? This was the best hospitality experience I have ever experienced through Airbnb ... Anywhere.  The apartment is super and the location couldn't be better. Ricardo is an exceptional host.

Ricardo is a superb host, and his apartment in Buenos Aires is great! The location could not be better, with the oblesco and many other popular destinations right outside the door. The apartment is high enough above the ground that the noise is minimal, considering that you are staying at the epicenter of the city. Amazing views from the balcony, very friendly doormen, and Ricardo's personal service are all reasons I would not hesitate to stay at his place again. Great experience!

Ricardo ist ein wunderbarer Gastgeber!!! Vor der Reise hatten wir schon einen super Kontakt und haben einiges besprechen können. Er hat immer alle meine Fragen sofort beantwortet. Auch während der Reise fragte Ricardo ständig nach, ob alles in Ordnung (URL HIDDEN) war alles in Ordnung. Eine wunderschöne Wohnung, sehr stilvoll eingerichtet. Der Balkon mit der Aussicht wunderbar!! Bei der Ankunft war der Kühlschrank mit  Getränken gefüllt und eine große Schale Obst stand bereit. Die Nachbarn waren alles sehr nett. Ich habe mich rundherum wohl gefühlt und kann diese Wohnung nur weiter empfehlen!!!

O apartamento é ótimo! O sistema de isolamento acústico realmente funciona e as cortinas blackout nos permitem, em dias de frio, dormir até mais tarde. A cama é super confortável, as toalhas de banho são excelentes. A cozinha é bem equipada, enfim... A iluminação é aconchegante. As vezes, o sistema hidráulico faz um barulho mas não chega a atrapalhar. A localização é excelente, pois é próxima dos principais pontos turísticos e meios de acesso. O anfitrião foi muito prestativo e cordial. Obrigado, Ricardo!

Ricardo is an excellent host: good communication, helped us to check in and provided us with valuable information on how to tour BA.

The apartment was very clean in a central place and very safe. We received what we expected and beyond.

Thank you for the stay.
Excellent accueil et  une bouteille de vin en cadeau de bienvenue. Comme il y avait eu un petit problème avec l'eau chaude, Ricardo a eu la gentillesse de m'accompagner personnellement à l'aéroport.

Ricardo was an incredible host. He responded promptly to all communications before, during, and after our stay at his apartment. He met us on arrival and gave us a very detailed overview of the apartment, surrounding neighborhood, and things to do in BsAs. He takes his hosting duties very seriously and it felt like a hotel with incredible concierge service.

Ricardo's Place is Great !  He was very accommodating after experiencing a bit of a glitch and in the end everything was perfect.  To me it was centrally located since all the neighborhoods of interest are within walking distance, cheap cab ride or subway ride.  To me the very center is of much interest since it symbolizes the very heart of legendary Buenos Aires of yesterday, today and the future.  I would not stay in any other neighborhood.  The building is super safe - and for the experienced traveler and anyone on their toes - the neighborhood is sufficiently safe.  For all travelers - please do your research and enjoy this beautiful city and consider its rocky history. LOVE !

Ricardo is a very organized,  flexible and friendly host. Answer all our  questions. Taking care off all our  needs. Prepared a list of all the impotent things we need to know abut the apartment, area and spending time . even a card ready to use in the subway.

This is a great flat, very well equipped, AC (this was needed, very hot these days). The bed is very comfortable, and as I stayed for 4 weeks, convenient with washmachine with dryer. I had regular contact with Ricardo before and during my stay, and he  even helped finding a person which I could have some Spanish lessons with (thank you, Adriana!). 
You feel very safe in the flat with doormen 24/7, and I had great joy speaking with especially the oldest, his name is Angel, so friendly and he even supplied me with newpapers a couple of times. 
The location is great. I could walk to San Telmo where I had tango lessons (recommend Lucia and Gerry, you find them on Trip Advisor), and Avenida Corrientes is THE street for theaters. I always go to at least one musical visiting big cities- here I saw Dracula! 
For me this was  a trip where I combined work and pleasure. I work on a book, so then the  flat was a good base for writing.
Thank you Ricardo! Thanks for making my stay so rewardful and enjoyable!

This might be the best apartment in all Buenos Aires. The rooftop balcony (private and attached to the apartment) offers amazing views of the Obelisk and Ninth of July Avenue - Buenos Aires's main street and one of the largest streets in the world. Perfectly situated near both bus stations and metro stations, as well as restaurants, grocery stores, and bars. Central location allows for easy access to all areas of Buenos Aires - Centro, Puerto Madero, Recoleta, San Telmo, and even Palermo. Everything is clean and modern, with great AC and WiFi. 

Ricardo was one of the best hosts I've ever had. He was extremely communicative before my arrival and was waiting at the apartment for my check-in. He provided a welcome assortment of wine, beer, champagne, fruit, water, and a couple of other items to get me started - all on the house. In addition he also provided a document with all of his recommendations for the area. It is very well-written and informative.

I couldn't have been happier with my experience, and I will definitely be booking Ricardo's apartment again when I come back to Buenos Aires.

The apartment was amasing. Thanks to the balcony we had the best view in Buenos Aires just in front of Obelisco. 
Very close from metro, supermarkets ...
Ricardo was really nice and help us with everything that we needed. 
I strongly recommend this place !

We had a very pleasant stay in Ricardos flat. Location is great on Buenos Aires "Broadway", close to theatres and concert venues. The view from the balcony along Av. Corrientes and the obelisco is really metropolitan. 

The appartment is very cosy. Compact but well planned. The balcony that you can reach from both the livingroom and the bedroom makes it feel much bigger. We spent quite a lot of time hanging out there, eating breakfest, a breath of air before going to bed, watching Plaza de la Republica shift shapes during the day. 

The bed is of hotel quality. Wifi is good. There's a washing machine! The appartment was tidy and fresh. 

Ricardo was exellent as a host. Met us at the appartment on time. Gave us valuable information about real time events in the city. 

We can warmly recomend this appartment and Ricardo as a host!

- Anders & Karin
